trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Columbia
There were no other sightings in Columbia on or around April 25th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi was walking down the street towards my brother's house looking at the stars, when i noticed a strange star that was brighter and bigger than the others, i than thought it was a helicopter, but it didn't have any blinking lights on it and there was no sound. it was a glowing white\yellow sphere. i pulled out my pocket cam and started filming. it was headed towards me in a wavering, bobbing flight path, than changed to go south, my left, than zipped away in a flash, it was gone. i was dumbfounded, laughed, and watched the footage a few times.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Saw what I thought was a star, than a helicopter, A glowing orb, making no sound. It didn't have any blinking lights, moved strange, changing direction, than disappered as if it flew off at a high rate of speed.
